document_data.name: Tilses
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tilses''' was a [[tiefling]] member of the [[Hellriders]], protectors of the holy city of [[Elturel]], during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|With respect, sir — being a [[Hellrider]] is for life. They can't take–|Tilly, to Commander [[Zevlor]].}}
document_data.Description: Tilses had light red skin and curly black hair she kept short.
document_data.Possessions: She wore a suit of [[padded armor]] and carried with her a [[longsword]].
document_data.History:
{{Quote|They can, and did. [[the Descent|Avernus]] changed things — best we get used to that.|Zevlor's response.}}

Tilses served with the Hellriders until the disaster known as [[the Descent]] befell Elturel in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. After the city was pulled briefly down to the plane of [[Avernus]] in the [[Nine Hells]], all of the city's tieflings – including those in the Hellriders – were exiled from the city. Tilses joined Commander [[Zevlor]] as he led a group of his people west along the [[Risen Road]] towards [[Baldur's Gate]], and aided him as the group took refuge at the [[Emerald Grove]] [[druid]]ic enclave.
